description: Explore how Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) can innovate compensation for contributors in the open-source software ecosystem, addressing challenges like burnout by providing proof of work, financial value, community engagement, and recognition for diverse contributions.
keywords: NFTs, open source, contributor rewards, digital tokens, blockchain, compensation model, provenance, crowdfunding, non-code contributions, governance, technological infrastructure, legal considerations, sustainability
title: The Role of NFTs in Open Source Rewards
